commands.cmd: pwd && echo '=== Files in current directory ===' && ls -la && echo '=== Looking for package.json ===' && (test -f package.json && echo '✓ package.json found' || (echo '✗ package.json NOT found' && echo 'Checking parent directories...' && ls -la .. 2>/dev/null || true))

if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm install; elif [ -f ../backend/package.json ]; then cd ../backend && pnpm install; elif [ -f ../../backend/package.json ]; then cd ../../backend && pnpm install; else echo 'ERROR: Cannot find package.json' && exit 1; fi

if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm prisma:generate; elif [ -f ../backend/package.json ]; then cd ../backend && pnpm prisma:generate; elif [ -f ../../backend/package.json ]; then cd ../../backend && pnpm prisma:generate; else echo 'ERROR: Cannot find package.json for prisma generate' && exit 1; fi

if [ -f package.json ]; then pnpm build; elif [ -f ../backend/package.json ]; then cd ../backend && pnpm build; elif [ -f ../../backend/package.json ]; then cd ../../backend && pnpm build; else echo 'ERROR: Cannot find package.json for build' && exit 1; fi
